original_text: But Jesus answered and said, Ye know not what ye ask. Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of, and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with? They say unto him, We are able.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 너희는 너희가 구하는 것을 알지 못하는도다 내가 마시려는 잔을 너희가 마실 수 있느냐 그들이 말하되 할 수 있나이다

sentences.original_text: Ye know not what ye ask.
Are ye able to drink of the cup
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내가 마실 잔을 마실 수 있느냐

sentences.original_text: and to be baptized with the baptism
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 받는 세례를 받을 수 있느냐
